## ADP January 2017 Employment Change - Key Markets
### 4 May 2017


```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
setwd("~/DDP/week2")
dfEmpHist<-read.csv("ADP_RER_History_2017_01.csv")
library(leaflet)
dfEmpHist %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircles(weight=1, radius = as.numeric(dfEmpHist$PctChange)*10000)

```
